text: yeah, Molly remembers things Beef says!  doesn't get more serious than that.

text: Apparently we have a couple of Buffy fanfic writers on here

name: juancarlos
text: Whaa? How is she a bitch? I dare you to find a woman that calls YOU the next day. Nonsense I say.

name: songbirdspectre
text: wow. you really are the pat.

name: boredom_man
text: Is most lamed message, played on ugliest guitar.

name: mastronaut
text: oh now i see how asherdan got to be the most lamed poster on the messageboard.

name: ted0phile
text: I'm still not getting why everyone hates Mr. Asherdan. At least, I assume he's a mister. What with 'dan' being in his name... and all...

name: anticitizen
text:
wait, shit, is this it???

in my newfound unemployment i've had a lot of damn time to go through the archive and thumb through the comments on assetbar thereafter. i think this is it, the sin asherdan committed that doomed him forever thereafter to all of his posts being guaranteed at least forty lames apiece.

name: anticitizen
text: thereafter thereafter.

name: asherdan
text: No man. Start with the 'Stoned Lightning' softball arc where this place opened up and work out from there for your rosetta stone.

name: asherdan
text: Hey, sorry about the unemployment drag, while you're at it. I don't think this place is a paying gig though, y'know.

name: anticitizen
text: in a perfect world, IT WOULD BE.

name: riotdejaneiro
text: What the FUCK asherdan. Honestly. What the fuck.

name: deimosrising
text: This is a really ineffective way of getting a woman, I have a friend who basically asks this same question every time and gets his shit shot down all the way to hell

name: clintisiceman
text: It's a tough question to ask. I always wait hell of long or just pretend I think it's implied until the girl asks me. I do that in the manner of a coward.

name: charchar
text: Speaking as a member of the fairer sex, I can assure you that the strategy is quite effective when used properly.  Pretty guys generally pull it off better; also, you have to talk to her first.

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Zefiel, pwb, GeyserShitdick, lamelliform, bug, Howard, SoupyTwist, werthog42, littlefatdog, yingkaixing, dropkickpikachu)

name: peterjoel
text: I sense that this post got so many lames purely because it was by asherdan. That's perhaps unfair. Not EVERYTHING that asherdan says is worthless, offensive bullshit

name: straw
text: It may be that the above comment some felt needed to be lamed more than just once by them and overflowed onto this comment.  You can note that I didn't lame this comment (quite the opposite), but I can imagine that that may be the reason this one has so many lames.

name: mercuri0us
text: Oh, Asherdan.  You can't catch a break.

name: soticoto
text:
Why do people feel the need to make a whole analysis-comment thread every time Asherdan displays the ability to not ALWAYS be a total prat?

Amazingly enough, he is most likely just a fairly normal dude. And mostly laming him was always just a pattern-driven mode of amusement.
Makes me wish I still could.

name: jamb23
text:
THE ASHERDAN FALLOUT PATTERN

1. Asherdan says something normal.
2. He is lamed.
3. Everyone defends him.
4. They are chubbied.
5. Soticoto makes a comment about how he would lame Asherdan if he could because it's hilarious, and laments his revoked lame status*.
6. Silence.
7. Some guy no-one has heard of trawls through these archives and attempts to codify this phenomenon.
8. ULTRA SILENCE.

*Occasionally soticoto will also make a reference to how he is British, or will controversially challenge something someone said long ago (that may or may not be related to his Britishness), but this is not exclusive to the AFP.

name: fresco
text: ULTRA SILENCE

name: chaesar
text: Starting the question "Can you..." is so Beef. Like it is asking her a favor to spend time with him.

name: centipede_damascus
text: In the last panel there. Those are emotions I am very familiar with. Beef is the man.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Beef sinking down in terror as he asks her makes this strip for me.

name: lucid
text:
The stress involved in vocalising this question is likely aging him by several months.
The absence of stutter, pauses, mispronunciations and pitch shifts similar to adolescent voice-breaking times is purely for readability purposes.

name: feetnotes
text:
I totally said that to a lady a few months ago. Now she is my girlfriend.

--Living the Dream--

name: spinynorman
text:
I periodically check this to see if you've made an addendum and she is now the Venemous Bitch from Hell and you are no longer living the dream.

I am pleased to see this is not the case.

name: heccibiggs
text: Do you actually do that? Because that's a little weird.

name: spinynorman
text:
No. As a matter of fact I saw this response in my inbox and had no fucking clue what it could be about.

But to be honest, "Do you actually do that? Because that's a little weird" could apply to so many things I do.

name: feetnotes
text: I regret to inform you that it has indeed ended quite badly. Sorry about the downer :(

name: spinynorman
text: Aw, shit

name: zapatos
text: At least it was cool for a while eh?

name: soticoto
text:
Inevitability.
Norman called it, naturally.

name: epicurus
text: I did this once in high school.

name: heccibiggs
text: Did you.

name: straw
text: Roast beef is the flyest.

name: behka
text: what lady can resist that. he's so sweet.

FUUUUUUUUUUUCK.

(I regret nothing.)

name: semiquaver
text:
You're a bitch. Bitch bitch bitch bitch bitch bitch bitch bitch...bitch.

(holds his coat open for lamers who don't know what he's talking about)

name: tekende
text: Not the alt text for this strip, though. This one is a line from "Everybody Wants to Go to Heaven" by Love and Rockets.

name: toughasnails001
text: I have been Roast Beef in this comic several times in my life.

name: captainpeepers
text:
I identified with Roast Beef in this comic once. Except things went different, and now I identify with Roast Beef 5 months before this arc.

:(

name: ctrl-s
text: "do you want to see the kingdom without a king" -- best alt text ever.

name: steerpike66
text: It's so moving that the verb Beef uses is 'Can', as in, would you have the potential ability to make being my girlfriend possible one day?' Not the confident predictive 'Will' confusingly used in the strip title.

name: layzerblade
text: Or even the polite "would". Not even daring to imagine that she might want to be his girlfriend, Beef only asks if she considers herself physically capable.

name: toiletstore
text: Beef is hell of on fire

name: luckypyjamas
text:
so he says "show some stones for once in your life" but he's dead

i really like his flinching, too

name: tekende
text: I'm not sure why, but that really made me laugh. The "but he's dead" part, I mean. Good job posting that.

name: narm
text: this one is my favorite.

name: sje46
text: I think this is one of my favorites as well.

name: delicatemoth
text: Roast Beef is now my favourite cartoon character, more than Fat Freddy's Cat, more than T Rex, more than Strontium Dog. He is hot as the dickens.

name: origotoshi
text: Strontium Dog, from the old Judge Dredd comics?

name: puguglypress
text: The alt text is badass

name: sevenslashfour
text: Beef is so cute.

name: riotdejaneiro
text: The last panel could make a lady weep. It could make a homeless man turn his life around and achieve more then any man has ever achieved before. It is basically like piano music.
